caption_query.instruction: Detailed description of visible elements, including object types, counts, and locations. (Answer type: Text)

grounding_query.instruction: Locate and return oriented bounding boxes for objects in the image. (Answer type: JSON style with object IDs (integer) and 5-parameter oriented bounding box coordinates)

obbox: float (angle w.r.t horizontal axis counter clockwise positive)

binary.instruction: Yes/No question regarding the scene details. (Answer type: Binary - Yes/No)

numeric.instruction: Question requiring a count or numerical value. (Answer type: Numeric - Float Positive)

semantic.instruction: Question about scene features. (Answer type: Text)
